name: Lost In Space (itch) (rubend151)
description:
Lost in Space is a videogame about a space explorer who finds himself on an unknown planet due to his spaceship falling down apparently out of nowhere while traveling through outer space.

Upon waking up after being knocked unconscious from the fall, our hero notices his spaceship is missing. The ruler of the planet he’s now in has taken the spaceship for himself to research the high-end technology it possess which would further aid the development of the planet.

Now it’s up to the player to get the spaceship back from the evil ruler and to leave the planet at once. To do so the player will have to go through various regions of the planet (in the form of 8 unique levels) and reach the final area where he can find and defeat the evil ruler.
